children.defaultText:
# General Instructions

1. **Reference Id** can be used to identify a single operation performed on the portal.
2. **Bulk Id** can be used to find all the operations of a particular type that were present in the uploaded file.
3. All the operations performed on the portal can be found in the **Reference Status** page.
4. If you face any errors while selecting a `customer` for a page, it is most likely because of invalid credentials setup for the selected customer. Try setting the correct credentials for the customer in the **Customers** page or contact the support team.


# Reference Status

You can use this page to track the status of the operations performed on other pages. It contains all the information such as who performed the operation, when the operation was performed etc.

**Note**:
1. Clicking on any `row` opens a pop up window with a more details about the operation.
2. You can add or remove `columns` in the table using the fields dropdown.
3. To view the operation/error object, please click on the `row` of the operation. This opens a pop up window with the details of the operation. Please click on the **copy button** on the top to copy the json version of the data. The json data will contain the error object.
